text: This Quarto website is hosted with GitHub Pages. Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see https://quarto.org.

title: EMC Viroscience

Adding blogs
To add blogs to this Quarto website, just place your html files within the docs/ folder. I need to test this.

title: Welcome to the EMC Viroscience site!
text:
This webpage hosts manuals for various bioinformatic workflows. Here are some recent posts:
